name: Adult Nudity and Sexual Activity
description: Restricts display of nudity and sexual activity due to cultural sensitivity and age considerations. Allows certain contexts like protest, breastfeeding, and medical purposes.
corePrinciple: We restrict nudity and sexual activity because some people may be sensitive to this content due to cultural background or age. We make allowances for protest, breastfeeding, post-mastectomy, and real world art depicting nudity.

photorealistic.definition: Image or video that looks like a photograph or video of a real person, place, or event

digital.definition: AI or computer-generated imagery that is not photorealistic
indicators: Photo editing using a program (cut and paste signals)
Paint programs with 8-bit or square pieces on lines

realWorldArt.definition: Artwork as real world object using traditional forms
indicators: Artwork is real world object (statues, figurines, lamps)
realWorldArt.note: Does not include imagery of real people on any medium

types.name: Explicit Sexual Activity or Stimulation
types.definition: Explicit intercourse/oral sex with visible genitals/anus, or explicit stimulation with sex toys

types.name: Implicit or Other Sexual Activity or Stimulation
types.definition: Implied intercourse/oral sex where contact not directly visible, or impending sexual activity

types.name: Fetish Content

types.definition: Including genitalia covered only by pubic hair

types.name: Secretly Recorded Videos
types.definition: Videos focusing on crotch, buttocks, or female breasts recorded without PDITI's awareness

types.name: Animal Sexual Activity
types.definition: Animals engaged in sexual activity or with visible genitals

sexuallySuggestiveContent.name: Sexually Suggestive Content
sexuallySuggestiveContent.note: Only label under this section when content not labeled under any above sections

types.name: Stripping and Passive Stripping
types.definition: Removal or partial tugging of clothing to expose what's underneath

types.name: Revealing Clothing
types.definition: Clothing with coverage equivalent to underwear, or see-through clothing

types.name: Sexually Touching/Moving Body Parts
types.definition: Sexual contact with or repeated shaking of sexualized body parts
